column15: B01. I am interested in my work
column16: B02. I am sufficiently challenged by my work

column21: B07. I have a clear understanding of [my organisation's] objectives
column22: B08. I understand how my work contributes to [my organisation's] objectives

column25: B11. My manager is open to my ideas

column28: B14. My manager recognises when I have done my job well

column41: B27. I am treated with respect by the people I work with

column53: B39. Compared to people doing a similar job in other organisations I feel my pay is reasonable

column57: B43. I believe that [the board has] a clear vision for the future of [my organisation]
column58: B44. Overall, I have confidence in the decisions made by [my organisation's senior managers]
column59: B45. I feel that change is managed well in [my organisation]
column60: B46. When changes are made in [my organisation] they are usually for the better
column61: B47. [My organisation] keeps me informed about matters that affect me

column63: B49. I think it is safe to challenge the way things are done in [my organisation]
column64: B50. I am proud when I tell others I am part of [my organisation]
column65: B51. I would recommend [my organisation] as a great place to work
column66: B52. I feel a strong personal attachment to [my organisation]

column70: B56. I believe that managers where I work will take action on the results from this survey
column71: B57. Where I work, I think effective action has been taken on the results of the last survey
column72: B58. I am trusted to carry out my job effectively
column73: B59. I believe I would be supported if I try a new idea, even if it may not work
column74: B60. When I talk about [my organisation] I say "we" rather than "they"
